summary: Consume ServiceNow API to perform various operations like uploading attachments, getting user information, etc.

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: Authentication method to use (Basic Auth or OAuth2)

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Choose the type of resource to interact with (e.g., User, Incident, Attachment)

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource (e.g., Upload, Delete, Get)

parameters.name: table name or id
parameters.description: Choose the table name or specify an ID for the operation (e.g., attachment upload)

parameters.name: table record id
parameters.description: Sys_id of the record in the specified table to attach the file to

parameters.name: input data field name
parameters.description: Name of the binary property containing the data to upload

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional options for the operation (e.g., file name for attachment)

parameters.name: attachment id
parameters.description: ID of the attachment for operations like delete or get
